content:
I deviated after writing these letters, but some months then I started to firm it more than before, and then the faith proved to be bigger than the bad things thrown on my head.

You could "deviate" from being on an church or from your religious works, but not from an conversion.

With crptos, it is pub/trnsparent
There is no donation page
I heard a lot of atks such as "money to the christians", "want to go church to find an girlfriend and earn success and money"
